overview: From 2025-11-23 to 2025-11-30, elizaos/eliza had 2 new PRs (2 merged), 22 new issues, and 9 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Add OpenAI-compatible API
topIssues.author: joglomedia
topIssues.body:
Hi,

It would be great if we have an option to use LLM API from OpenAI-compatible API, not only open router. So, we can set the API host & API Key

topIssues.title: Add Capability Toggles for Performance
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: Add UI toggles in the Agent Builder (e.g., "Enable Web Search," "Enable Image Gen") that are **OFF** by default. This improves the agent's response speed by reducing the context/prompt size for the LLM.

topIssues.title: Implement Inline Image/Video Generation
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body: The "Image" and "Video" tabs in the Studio are currently placeholders. The goal is to have image generation working **inline** within the chat bubbles (which Joker has started) rather than just in a separate tab.

topPRs.title: refactor: Standardize Logging Across Core, CLI, and Server
topPRs.author: standujar

topPRs.title: fix: topP support for anthropic PR
topPRs.author: odilitime
topPRs.body:
<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
> [!NOTE]
> Introduce `topP` as a configurable model parameter (defaults and per-model-type) and pass-through in runtime-generated params.
> 
> - **Core Runtime (`packages/core/src/runtime.ts`)**
>   - Extend model settings resolution to include `TOP_P` with default and model-specific fallbacks; make `legacyKey` optional.
>   - Populate `modelSettings.topP` when available.
> - **Types (`packages/core/src/types/model.ts`)**
>   - Add `MODEL_SETTINGS` keys for `DEFAULT_TOP_P`, `TEXT_SMALL_TOP_P`, `TEXT_LARGE_TOP_P`, `OBJECT_SMALL_TOP_P`, `OBJECT_LARGE_TOP_P`.
>   - Extend `GenerateTextParams` with optional `topP`; note provider capability differences in docs.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit de266adf45a5bd6b11d34a2e872aff882f7a63d2. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

topPRs.title: fix(core): resolve TS2358 instanceof error
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
Fix TypeScript declaration build failure caused by `instanceof` checks on generic type `ModelParamsMap[T]`.

### Changes
- Add `isPlainObject` type guard in `utils/type-guards.ts`
- Replace manual instanceof checks in `runtime.ts` with the new type guard
- Add comprehensive test coverage (28 tests)

### Why
TypeScript cannot use `instanceof` on generic types. The type guard with `unknown` parameter resolves TS2358.
